lenders.occupational_info: Compassion is what enables us to relate to one another despite the differences in our appearance, status, wealth, personal view, or conviction. True compassion allows us to eradicate those barriers and look at people as People. We are all human beings, we all share the same desire to pursue happiness in our lives; we all want food on our table and a roof over our head; and we all want freedom from suffering. If we can reflect on this thought for a little bit, and realize that we are, in essence, One and the same, I truly believe we all have the power to help one another and act on our compassion.

In addition, if you GIVE someone food or clothing, you take away the oppertunity for someone ELSE in the impoverished area to support themselves by selling food or clothing.  By loaning to resourceful people in the area, you are supporting the role models.

lenders.name: Lorry
lenders.loan_because: It's a small but progressive step toward equalizing the world's wealth. I'm grateful to KIVA for giving me a do-able way to make a positive difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint and draw, mainly people. Everything about our planet is astounding, but nothing fascinates me like our own species.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because:
My knowledge of Kiva began when my sister gave me an electronic gift certificate to Kiva for Christmas.

 My husband and I took a huge interest in helping people less privileged than us. 

We lend money because, after being introduced to the organization, we believe in assisting people looking to make a better life for themselves, their families, and their community.

We are especially interested in assisting entrepreneurs involved with renewable energy.


Long story short -- we lend because we can, because morally we should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a palliative care coordinator. Palliative care aims to relieve suffering and improve quality of life for patients with advanced illness and their families. Palliative care is provided by an interdisciplinary team and offered in conjunction with all other appropriate forms of medical treatment. As a nurse coordinator, I work with a team that includes a physician, the nurse, a social worker, a chaplain, and a music therapist. I spend alot of time looking at patient's physical symptoms, but also a significant amount of time is spent dealing with the emotional aspect of the patient and the family.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: To those who are given much, much is expected.

lenders.name: Marlene Boychak
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is how I can give back some of what has been given to me and help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and support programs used for computer or manufacturing process controls.

lenders.name: Abi
lenders.loan_because: if everyone who had a little bit more would reach out to someone who has a little less, we could all significantly reduce the economic disparity in the world, and help the world evolve humanitarially.

lenders.name: Art
lenders.loan_because:
See my Micro Loan VIDEO about reducing extreme poverty in the world,  posted on the web  Go to youtube.com  and search for Art Roberts. The video will come right up at the top. or www.google.com and then search for    theartroberts      and the video will show up right there.

Micro loaning is the most important thing we all must absolutely do and at a minimum of one loan to someone each and every month because Micro loaning instantly improves the world for another person. Besides, the best joyous fun feeling  is created when we share our wealth with another person and see their life improve just because they received that support and love from us.
lenders.occupational_info: I make and provide the most powerful, yet very inexpensive, learning tool games that help all kids, anywhere in the world, memorize the very important basic Adding and Subtracting numbers plus much much more.

lenders.name: Jon & Susan
lenders.loan_because: people helping people

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I come from a small business family.  People with a good ideas, entrepenurial spirit, and the desire to make their lives better should not pass up an opportunity due to  limited finances, especially when the amount of money they need is readily available in a more industrialized country.

lenders.name: Brandon and Jamie
lenders.occupational_info: Long days, lots of travel.

lenders.name: Barbora
lenders.loan_because: I can imagine the direct results, and not merely hope that I'm making a difference. I am confident that the money will be put to good use, and people will improve their situations. And really, even though a student's life is hard, I can do without a couple of bucks.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, taking environmental studies at York University. I'm learning about how political and economic forces affect the environment, and what I can do to help.

lenders.name: Scott and Denise
lenders.loan_because: We love the opportunity to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Dena
lenders.loan_because: I like supporting positive development in the world. I believe in peaceful actions, not war. I want to share my wealth and resources with those less fortunate. And lending through Kiva is easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art, dance, music and theater to students from Kindergarten through 8th grade in a very small town in a rural state.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and support small business.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to put their ideas into action.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: it is a small way that I can help make a difference.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I have so much, and this takes so little to make a difference. We are blessed, and blessings should be shared.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have stories to tell, so their voice will be heard.

lenders.name: wanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. As a small business owner in this country I know how hard it can be to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make people feel good while they are with me. That will help them have a better day which in turn and help others. Pay it forward.

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people, especially people who work very hard and have a difficult life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in charge of a computer network in a University.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.loan_because: it's important to promote and support small businesses across the globe. A healthy global economy includes successful small businesses.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because:
"Find out how much God has given you and from it take what you need; the remainder is needed by others."

---St. Augustine

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: more of us should.

lenders.name: Elijah
lenders.loan_because: Politics aside, we are all one family, and we should take care of each other. Don't believe otherwise!!
lenders.occupational_info: musician/service industry worker (bar/nightclub)

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: God has given His Son for me. I respond with generosity and build His kingdom by encouraging the development of small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I administrate and do audio & video production on various programs for release around the world on DVD & web streaming, in many languages.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major manufacturer in the United States.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: with donations there is no guarantee that the people who really need the money get it.  This is a direct approach which I really like

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: I like to see what a little bit of money and faith in someone can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I studied Political Science, International Relations, and History. I am also a wife and mother

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because: I' d like to help someone support their family and because God has been good to me.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because:
I have a strong interest in social justice, and I believe that micro-financing can help us to accomplish Goal 8 of the Millennium Development Goals. I believe that making a change starts with me.

I also believe in Christ, and my faith compels me to act.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a BSW, I help to connect others to the resources they need to be successful. This may mean connecting them to housing and food, helping to train them for a job, or working through their mental health. 

As a global citizen, I am committed to advocating for those whose voices are not heard. I am both obligated and compelled to fight for social justice.

As an non-profit staff member, I am part of a workforce development program for young adults in our nation's capital in order to empower them to take advantage of the opportunities that education provides. For our program, this includes GED education and construction training, per the YouthBuild model.

lenders.name: Myra, Hanky and Chip
lenders.loan_because: giving something back to the world is important to us. More than anything, its our way to help someone make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher, my son Hank is 12 years old; he started his own business three years ago, and my  son Myron "Chip" is 4 years old.

lenders.name: Asaf
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if others do not have the same opportunities we do, but they are still willing to work towards bettering their life, we should help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I want to raise awareness towards the poverty in the world. Many people do not understand that even though we "need" the money, many actually need it to survive.

A small donation will not change my life, but it will it might change someone else's.

lenders.name: Kjetil
lenders.loan_because: Because i think Kiva represents a fantastic opportunity for me to make a difference for real people, and i know the money is put to better use than if i kept them in my bank.

lenders.name: cindy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my husband sell seafood that he catches off of his boat.

lenders.name: Toby and Miles
lenders.loan_because: to help people who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying lots of things to get smarter

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: Our daughter introduced us to kiva with a gift certificate for the holidays.  She had already shared news about one of her loans.  We were so proud of her for investing in other peoples lives.  Couldn't wait to get started with our own account.  Have totally enjoyed loaning and reading about the progress of our people.  Also have been inspired to give gift certificates to get others involved. What at great idea!

lenders.name: richard & rickie kendall
lenders.loan_because: its a place to start to make a change in the world
lenders.occupational_info: tradesman

lenders.name: Camren
lenders.loan_because: My Uncle is a Lender and he's getting me started with Kiva. Since pretty much everything he does is cool I knew I wanted to learn more about helping others...
lenders.occupational_info: I just really like to be a helper

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: this is an incredible opportunity to help others succeed.

lenders.name: Kipp
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to this amazing program by amazing friends of mine, Asad and Olivia as an amazing birthday gift!
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy helping protect and enhance natural resources using fire as a tool.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I've worked in microfinance and I've witnessed its transformative impact.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: it brings me joy.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage operations at a small medical device company that makes products that help physicians diagnose cancer.

lenders.name: Adam & Victoria
lenders.loan_because: we are keen to help people build viable businesses so they don't have to live in extreme poverty any more.
lenders.occupational_info: We record and produce Voice Overs for TV, radio and corporations all over the world.

lenders.name: dadang
lenders.loan_because: i loan because for develop my business. I have a little business. i sell book, equipment education   to school & traditional market.  order to, i can change in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: i buy to distributor, then i re-seller to buyer/retailer. i have margin bruto 30-45%.

lenders.name: September
lenders.occupational_info: I use the law and the U.S. legal system to help citizens protect the environment and our natural resources.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning directly to a person and knowing exactly how I am helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I solve puzzles using computers.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I live a comfortable life and I want to share what the Lord has given me with those who need help improving their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software for a small manufacturing company.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: My family wanted to do something together to help others. This is a family project that we hope to continue to grow a little at a time.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: My father gave each of his children a Kiva gift certificate, so I continually re-loan to improve the quality of life around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a student studying Mechanical Engineering with an emphasis studying Fluid Dynamics.

lenders.name: Andrew M.
lenders.loan_because: It such a small thing to do, but means a lot to the people who are trying so hard to support their families with their entrepreneurial ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a business manager for a Daily newspaper.

lenders.name: Deana
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a hand sometime.

lenders.name: Erin and Sara
lenders.loan_because: Our dad introduced us to this site and gave us money to loan to KIVA for Christmas.  We would like to get more involved in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Erin is going to UCSB this fall. She went to Ghana with AFS last summer for a community service team mission for 4 weeks. Sara is a sophomore and is in Interact and will hopefully study abroad too.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a testament to how a little help can go a long way. It helps people help themselves, which allows for a sustainable and lasting impact. Organizations like Kiva are sending a message that any average person can make a difference and fight poverty.

lenders.name: Marathon Communications
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we are making a difference in lives with our work and we want to extend our success to other enterpreneurs in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a corporate training company that helps employees to be more successful in their work and we support managers to be better leaders.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the difference it makes.
lenders.occupational_info: International development

lenders.name: Shujaat
lenders.loan_because: i want donations to continue my higher education.

lenders.name: Marissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with businesses in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to medical school to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Burt
lenders.loan_because: I'm spreading the love

lenders.name: Lauren and Tony
lenders.loan_because: Mankind is my business...
lenders.occupational_info: Education of children, ages 7-10.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and because I am a small business person myself and know the value of having the capital needed to get to the next level.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a network administrator (I take care of lots of computers) and I also do consulting for small businesses.

lenders.name: JSL
lenders.loan_because: A small change can make a great difference.

lenders.name: Garrett
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make drinks and serve food.

lenders.name: Sietske
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deservice a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my 5 year old son, and my baby daughter . And I study for social worker. I would like to work with childeren, when my daughter goes to school.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because:
“No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.” 
― Charles Dickens

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: it will likely do some good, more good than the money will do here.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of pregnant women and do surgery.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I so agree with Kiva's philosophy of empowering people to help themselves and not just given a "hand-out". I do this as well, (donate to charities) but there is a more satisfying feeling to know that people are doing best when helping themselves and that I have been a small part in supporting them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary educator having taught 3rd grade through 6th grade. Also a specialized kinesiologist, teaching courses and writing articles, presentations, books for people to help themselves be well naturally.

lenders.name: Stijn
lenders.loan_because: I have it and they don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer games to hardware manufacturers.

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: It's great to collaborate in something worthwhile.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I believe that God provides some people with the ability and the opportunity to share their blessings with others. It is only by sheer luck and circumstance that I have as much wealth as I have. It is my responsibility to be a productive steward of that wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites and make commercials for businesses to advertise their products.

lenders.name: Cameron' Dad
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a hand-up instead of a hand-out.  A rising tide raises all ships.
lenders.occupational_info: We produce energy using solar panels and wind turbines.  In turn, we sell that electricity to the major utilities.

lenders.name: Georgia
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Whimiscal

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because:
Although the world is full of suffering it is also full of the overcoming of it.

My wish and goal in life is to make a less fortunate person fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Internet Online marketing Entrepreneur who helps people build businesses and friendships as well as support Charity.

lenders.name: Pieter
lenders.loan_because: I Care

lenders.name: Rui
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is possible, with a little help from those who can, to change the lives of people with whom we share the common pursuit of happiness
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the field of Corporate Social Responsibility and try to help the company I work for to fulfill its goals and expectations concerning its social and environmental responsibility

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: To help business owners reach their goals.

lenders.name: Kennon
lenders.loan_because: i have been given much, and now it's time to give back

lenders.name: Linda Sullivan
lenders.loan_because: My sons gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday. They know that giving to others is what makes me happiest. I have been so fortunate to live in the USA, have a good education and a steady income. I want to help others get a rung up on the economic ladder so they can educate their children. I believe that education is the key to preventing future wars and creating the opportunity to grow and care for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a public health nurse. I track contagious diseases and work to prevent the spread of illness. I teach people how to be healthy and live more fully into a healthy old age.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Nairobi, Kenya, when I was young and saw how much of a difference access to credit can mean for people.  "Banker to the Poor" by Mohammad Yunus, founder of Grameen Bank, is also very inspiring.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to start new businesses and also to fix businesses which are not doing so well.  I have mostly worked in software and high technology, my most recent business openned 10 offices in developing countries around the world and sought to better the lives of all citizens in each of these regions.

lenders.name: MagazineEspresso
lenders.loan_because: Giving is living, my friend.
lenders.occupational_info: Espresso Bar

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want people to be able to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a refinery; making gasoline, diesel and jet fuels.

lenders.name: John & Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: it encourages sustainable growth, it's empowering, and it makes financial sense.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to lend a helping hand to others who are making their own way and working to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies make their websites work harder and smarter.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has the right to capital to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage business support operations (finances, contracts, supply chain, projects/program management) for IT Services engagements.

lenders.name: Andréia
lenders.loan_because: Eu adoro trabalhar com animais..
lenders.occupational_info: Meu objetivo é de montar um negócio com cães,montar um cemitério de cães onde seus donos possam ao final da vida de seus animais,deixa-los descansar em um lugar onde possam visitá-los e matar a saudade,para tanto preciso de algo em torno de$6.000 dólares,tive a idéia de criar esse espaço,quando perdi meu cãozinho,que durante muito tempo foi meu grande amigo e companheiro,naregião onde moro ainda não há esse tipo de lugar,por isso acredito que seja um ótimo negócio,e com um risco muito pequeno,quase nulo de não dar certo...

lenders.name: Michaela & Austin
lenders.loan_because: we can and are following the example set by our parents.

lenders.name: Joerg
lenders.loan_because: It helps others to fulfill their endeavours of entrepreneurship, to make a living  and to become more independent.
lenders.occupational_info:
Responsible for a porcelain manufactury still producing in the purest sense of the 18th century.
Preserving a tradition of 260 years of craftmanship at the highest level and being avantgarde in porcelain at the same time.

lenders.name: DSU TR Scholars
lenders.loan_because: We believe we can change the world for the better one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of honors students attending Dickinson State University.

lenders.name: Aubree
lenders.loan_because: I cannot be aware of suffering and do nothing.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I can and care

lenders.name: UIUC SPAN 332
lenders.loan_because: The class is entitled "Spanish & Entrepreneurship: Languages, Cultures & Communities." We focus on social entrepreneurship, and through Kiva, students are learning what can be accomplished in Latin America through social e-ship.
lenders.occupational_info: I (Ann Abbott) am a professor of Spanish at the University of Illinois.  I am interested in community-based learning and social entrepreneurship in US Latino and Latin American communties.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I know that my help can have a big impact on someone who is working hard to change their life.
